summary: This weekend was crazy.... absolutely crazy. I can't believe this actually happened. We met so many amazing critters and if we...
body:
This weekend was crazy…. absolutely crazy. I can’t believe this actually happened. We met so many amazing critters and if we had been a little braver, we would have probably made a ton of new friends. Instead we just stood a little further away and watched the amazing cosplayers in awe.

Meeting the cast of Critical Role, even if just for some seconds, meant so much to me. These people have helped me through a very difficult time in my life and are still doing so. They inspire me each in their own way and bring me so much joy. They are the thing that keep me going every single day. And I cannot thank them enough for flying all the way to London just to meet us European Critters.

Conventions are not the nicest thing for the guest stars… I imagine it to be very exhausting. Sitting there, smiling into phones and people’s faces, talking and being nice all day, being rushed to panels and photos OPs and all of that for two or three days for several hours… and yet these people tried to give every person the best con experience. They smiled, hugged, shook hands and took selfies, listened to storied about how they mean the world to us. I cannot thank Matt, Marisha, Liam, Sam, Taliesin and Brian enough for doing all of this and powering through the masses of people. Thank you so much!

(@groan-taire as Mollymauk

Me as Caleb)

summary: I know it only just got released on youtube, but I want to remind everyone about the weird-ass monster movie/Julius Caesar...
body:
I know it only just got released on youtube, but I want to remind everyone about the weird-ass monster movie/Julius Caesar trailer in this week’s “All Work No Play” because…well, who was expecting that?

Also Dani “Stay Turnt. I’m Brian.” Carr.

Please watch All Work No Play so we all have more assurance that show isn’t a fever dream.

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

tags: do they have blood types in D&D
do broke wizards ever sell their plasma to buy spell components
summary: I have a lot of feelings about the M9 dying and meeting Molly briefly in the afterlife before getting revived, and it’s all...
body:
I have a lot of feelings about the M9 dying and meeting Molly briefly in the afterlife before getting revived, and it’s all emotional reunions and tears and whatnot…but then it happens to Caduceus and Molly stares at him for like 30 seconds before heaving a sigh and just being like, “I’m so pissed off I didn’t get to meet you when I was alive. I mean look at you, you’re exactly my type.”

And Caduceus is just like, “….I don’t know what that means?? Your type? Do you mean blood type? Because I’m AB positive.”

Later Molly goes crying to Vax about how all the guys he crushes on are impossible to flirt with. Why is the universe so cruel.
